response.overview: Experimental video consisting of the initial sentences of the newsletter sent by the Ordo Iuris Institute for Legal Culture. Selection from the years 2022 and 2021. Due to several years of subscription to this news channel the author is able to take a look at the daily life in Poland from the perspective of the Institute that describes itself in the following way: The Ordo Iuris Institute is an independent legal think-tank that, in the years of its activity, has built up an international renown of one of the key centers of defending legal culture based in the identity of European civilization, raised on the pillars of Greek philosophy, Roman law and Christian ethics.
response.title: Dear Madam
